title: Open Source Revenue Generation: Balancing Community and Commerce
description: Learn about open source revenue generation methods, including support services, freemium models, SaaS, donations, dual licensing, and more. Discover how open source projects balance free access with financial sustainability.
keywords: open source revenue, open source funding, open source business models, open source monetization, open source sustainability, open source software monetization, open source project funding, open source licensing, open core business model, freemium model open source, SaaS open source, open source donations, open source sponsorships, dual licensing open source, open source support services, open source consulting, open source revenue streams, open source revenue generation strategies, monetizing open source projects, funding open source projects, sustainable open source, open source community, open source business, open source commercialization
